Package com.nmr.repository

Class ContractRepo

java.lang.Object
com.nmr.repository.ContractRepo
@Repository
public class ContractRepo
extends java.lang.Object
The spring annotation 'repository' indicates that this is a repository class, and that it can be used for encapsulating, storage, retrieval and search behavior.

    ContractRepo()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean cancelContract​(int id)
    Method: 'cancelContract' makes an SQL call which updates the active field to 0, which, since it is a boolean, means it is now false.
    Contract completeContract​(int id, Contract contract)
    completeContract()
    Contract createContract​(Contract contract)
    Method: 'createContract' makes an SQL call and inserts the contract information given in the HTML 'create contract' tab into the MySQL database.
    java.lang.Boolean deleteContract​(int id)
    Method: 'deleteContract' makes an SQL call which deletes a specific contract from database.
    java.util.List<Contract> fetchAll()
    Method: 'fetchAll' makes an SQL call which selects everything from the contract table.

    Method: 'FindContractById' makes an SQL call which selects a specific contract from the database.

    Method: 'rentalDateValidation' makes an SQL call which counts how many active contracts there is with a specific motorhome in specific rental period.

    Method: 'updateContract' makes an SQL call which updates the information in a specific contract

  • Method Details

    • createContract

      public Contract createContract​(Contract contract)
      Method: 'createContract' makes an SQL call and inserts the contract information given in the HTML 'create contract' tab into the MySQL database. Uses the JDBC template to execute the SQL query.
      Parameters:
      contract -
      Returns:

    • fetchAll

      public java.util.List<Contract> fetchAll()
      Method: 'fetchAll' makes an SQL call which selects everything from the contract table. The method uses the Spring RowMapper which automatically maps the attributes of our contract objects.
      Returns:
      JDBC template

    • findContractById

      public Contract findContractById​(int id)
      Method: 'FindContractById' makes an SQL call which selects a specific contract from the database. It uses the Spring rowMapper to map the attributes of the object and creates a contract object.
      Parameters:
      id - - The method takes an id given by the pathVariable annotation in our HomeController.
      Returns:
      - The method returns the specific contract which is used when updating a contract and when retrieving specific contract information for an invoice.

    • deleteContract

      public java.lang.Boolean deleteContract​(int id)
      Method: 'deleteContract' makes an SQL call which deletes a specific contract from database.
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:

    • cancelContract

      public java.lang.Boolean cancelContract​(int id)
      Method: 'cancelContract' makes an SQL call which updates the active field to 0, which, since it is a boolean, means it is now false. This is used in the PriceHandler class when calculating the cancellation fee.
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:

    • updateContract

      public Contract updateContract​(int id, Contract contract)
      Method: 'updateContract' makes an SQL call which updates the information in a specific contract
      Parameters:
      id -
      contract -
      Returns:

    • rentalDateValidation

      public boolean rentalDateValidation​(int motorhomeId, java.time.LocalDateTime rentalStartDate, java.time.LocalDateTime rentalEndDate)
      Method: 'rentalDateValidation' makes an SQL call which counts how many active contracts there is with a specific motorhome in specific rental period.
      Parameters:
      motorhomeId -
      rentalStartDate -
      rentalEndDate -
      Returns:
      - The method returns rowCount == 0 which is either true or false. If it is true, it means that there are no active contracts with the specific motorhome in the specific rental period. This us used to make sure the same motorhome is not rented out twice in the same period.

      public Contract completeContract​(int id, Contract contract)
      completeContract()
      Parameters:
      id -
      contract -
      Returns:
